title: Me Trying "The Package" For The First Time

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: OK maybe not just the first time...

replies.body: For a second I was like "man, you sure look an awful lot like Mike Tyson".
Same thing happens to me IRL.
Was Mike Tyson the inspiration for Braum?
i dont think so, but this guy was  http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=880110&d=1390097638
What is, "The Package" and where can I get one?
Watch "The Wire" and it will teach you everything.

My girlfriend trying "the package" for the first time ԅ( ͒ ۝ ͒ )ᕤ
https://i.imgur.com/HI5SvW0.gifv
Don't worry the first time I tried it I fell on my face. And the hoverboard went crashing into my friend's shin. Let's just say there's a reason he won't let me ride it.
